title: Do you find that Amazon's quality of service has dramatically deteriorated recently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, I agree. But I’m not really concerned. With COVID and the lockdowns many more people are buying online and it has greatly increased the demands on shippers and resellers. On one was staffed for what we are experiencing and on top of all that Amazon has had to also practice social distancing and work stoppages when they find infected people. Many people don’t want to work with with the extra federal unemployment payments for people who were make lower wages. This has added to the difficulty of staffing under these conditions. Eventually things will normalize; the COVID pandemic will end or find its equilibrium, people will return to work, people will stop hoarding and over ordering at some point and Amazon will continue to hire and balance its needs to fulfill orders as everything stabilizes.
